abstract: ABC led a close race for No. 1 in the ratings on Wednesday, with its 9 p.m. medical show, “Private Practice,” delivering 10.4 million viewers as well as the night’s top ratings among adults 18 to 49, according to Nielsen’s estimates. ABC also led the 8 p.m. hour in that demographic with its holiday special “Santa Claus Is Comin’ to Town” (9.4 million).
lead_paragraph: ABC led a close race for No. 1 in the ratings on Wednesday, with its 9 p.m. medical show, “Private Practice,” delivering 10.4 million viewers as well as the night’s top ratings among adults 18 to 49, according to Nielsen’s estimates. ABC also led the 8 p.m. hour in that demographic with its holiday special “Santa Claus Is Comin’ to Town” (9.4 million).

headline.main: ABC and NBC Take Wednesday Night
